# Tercen app library

The Tercen app library is managed by a json file. Currently Tercen support is the only authorized to modify it.

Anyone can request an app be added to the Tercen __app library__.

Here are the steps for adding it to Tercen __app library__:

* Notify Tercen support (info@tercen.om) regarding your wish to add it to __app-library__
* Tercen support tests the app
* Tercen support modifies the __app-library__ repository (publish)
* Tercen support send email to indicate it is available
